ygData.subject: I know...
ygData.msgSnippet: Because of my obvious genius, I was able to find more out about the collapsible fishing pole than ALL OF YOU put together, and not only do I think that I m on
ygData.messageBody:
Because of my obvious genius, I was able to find more out about the
collapsible fishing pole than ALL OF YOU put together, and not only do I
think that I'm on the verge of discovering the secret of the fishing pole,
but I think I'm on the verge of discovering the lost tinkering book! Hahaha!
I know something none of you know, but I'm not going to tell. I will not
dishonor my self or others, so sorry. I just wanted you guys to know tat I
know something, and could very well soon find out the secret, but like I
said, I won't tell.
